response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, we propose a purchase price of $1,350,000 for the product. We are confident this price reflects its true worth and offers you a fair deal. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service to ensure your satisfaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
